item.title: House Democrats roll out stock trading ban that includes Trump
item.description: The move could doom bipartisan efforts to ban stock trading, as Republicans may not back a measure that extends to the executive branch.

item.title: Trump trolls Biden, Obama in new plaques on ‘Presidential Walk of Fame’
item.description: The fresh adornments to a “Presidential Walk of Fame” that Trump installed in September take a display already intended as a bit of a troll to new hei...

item.title: To make newborn investment accounts a reality, Trump goes looking for donations
Moderate House Republicans join Democrats to force vote on ACA subsidies
item.description: The Senate has already rejected the plan, so the subsidies are still virtually certain to expire at the end of this year.

item.title: Trump administration admits to targeting blue states for energy grant cuts
item.description: Justice Department lawyers argue in court documents that it is legal for the administration to withhold funding based on partisan politics.
